about_the_game:
Greetings MechWarrior,
Legendary Mechs are here! Presenting the Marauder IIC "Dreadnought" Legendary Mech and Mini Battle Pass. Legendary Mechs have unique hard points, quirks, and a 30% C-Bill boost! Playing the Legendary Mech will unlock rewards from the Mini Battle Pass which includes unique in-game customization items, in-game currency, boosters, and consumables.
Become a Legend in MechWarrior Online!

The Legendary Mech Pack includes instant unlock!
  • Marauder IIC MAD-IIC-DN(LGD) - Dreadnought - Mech with a 30% C-Bill Boost
  • 1 Mech bay
  • "The Dreadnought" Title
  • "The Dreadnought" Badge


What is unlocked in the Mini Battle Pass?
New in-game Items
  • 3 x Dreadnought Standing Cockpit items
  • 3 x Dreadnought Mounted Warhorn Cockpit items
  • 3 x Dreadnought Hanging Cockpit items (with a 5% boost)
  • Dreadnought Badge as a Decal
  • "Compass" Decal
  • New Dreadnought Color
  • Dreadnought Spine Bolt-on

Currency, Boosters, and Consumables
  • 3000 MC
  • 7 Million C-Bills
  • 100 GSP
  • 7 days Active Premium Time x 2
  • 100 Artillery Consumables


Mini FAQ

Can you Buy the Legendary Mech pack more than once?

  • You can only purchase the Legendary Mech Pack once on Steam.

How do I unlock items in the Mini Battle Pass?

  • by playing the mech included in the Legendary Mech Pack.

Do I have to claim the items in the Mini Battle Pass?

  • The Mini Battle Pass items will need to be redeemed on the Legendary Mech Purchase page and added to your account as you unlock the Mini Battle Pass Tiers.

When does the Mini Battle Pass end?

  • The Mini Battle Pass pass does not expire. You can unlock the Mini Battle Pass at any time once you purchase the Legendary Mech Pack.

Where can I view, track, and redeem my Mini Battle Pass progress?

  • You can track your progress on the Legends DLC Page on .

Where can I view, track, and redeem my Mini Battle Pass progress?

subs.option_text: MechWarrior Online™ - Dreadnought Legendary Mech Pack - $14.99

package_groups.title: Buy MechWarrior Online™ - Dreadnought Legendary Mech Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel: Core 2 Duo E7300 @ 2.66 GHz / AMD: Athlon 64 X2 6400+ @ 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA: 8800 GT / AMD: Radeon HD 5670
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 45GB temporarily required during installation
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel: Core i5-3470 @ 3.20 GHz / AMD: FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA: GeForce GTX 660 / AMD: Radeon HD 7870
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
